name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an incident involving unauthorized access via a PowerShell script and addresses compromised systems and accounts.

action--e5c6c1c2-7b43-459f-89b8-6ac9a6c6.name: Kill malicious process
action--e5c6c1c2-7b43-459f-89b8-6ac9a6c6.description: Terminate the malicious PowerShell process if it is running.

commands.command: if pgrep -f 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File exploit.ps1'; then pkill -f 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File exploit.ps1'; fi

action--bf7ad3f2-8198-4d9b-928f-1b02d776.name: Patch vulnerable service
action--bf7ad3f2-8198-4d9b-928f-1b02d776.description: Apply patch to the vulnerable service and ensure it is not running after patching.

commands.command: until ! systemctl is-active vulnerable-service; do apt-get update && apt-get install vulnerable-service-patch; done

action--f6e4a1d1-c40b-4ad9-bc20-3ed290d7.name: Reset compromised passwords
action--f6e4a1d1-c40b-4ad9-bc20-3ed290d7.description: Expire the passwords of compromised users.

compromised_user.description: User account that has been compromised

action--a9f5d0e1-d2af-4337-8eed-49b2e58c.name: Conduct full system scan
action--a9f5d0e1-d2af-4337-8eed-49b2e58c.description: Perform a thorough system scan to detect any remaining threats.

commands.command: until clamscan -r / | grep 'No viruses found'; do clamscan -r /; done

action--d7b783da-3585-4c4e-973c-43d7f6a7.name: Review access logs for anomalous activity
action--d7b783da-3585-4c4e-973c-43d7f6a7.description: Examine the access logs for any suspicious activities.

system_scan_passed.description: Flag indicating if the system scan was successful
